title: Fragment, ca. 1830
medium: Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation; block registration marks visible
inscribed: "134 Oxford St MILES & EDWARDS" with crown within frame in black. on either side of this mark is a block printed anthemion frieze in red. "R.Turner" twice, once in brown, once in yellow. "H.E" in pale brown. "J.C" in green. Handwritten in ink, "25 1/2".
dimensions: Warp: 32 cm (12 1/2 in.). Weft: 89.5 cm (35 1/4 in.). Both selvedges present.
description: Mark faces in opposite direction to direction of pattern. Pattern of polychrome bunches of flowers on natural.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, ca. 1830.
ca. 1830. Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation; block registration marks visible. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-23.
